casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Otis McDONALD, Jr. No. 153P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*373The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of March 2007 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
